input_args.passage: 'Aranyaka (film) - Wikipedia | The film stars Sarat Pujari, Navni Parihar, Sanjana Kapoor and Mohan Gokhale in lead roles. Based on a short story Aranyaka by eminent writer Padma Bhushan Manoj Das, the film is set in rural Odisha, where a formal local ruler organizes a hunt for his invited guests, which goes wrong., rural Odisha'
input_args.claim: " and inform us that she starred in the film 'Aranyaka' alongside Sarat Pujari and Navni Parihar."
